column2:
"Most mellowed animal meat will be
hard. This is because they resemble
muscled parts that are well-trained."

"However, it may not be so for Dragorii
meat! ...as expected. Maybe. Surely.
Yes, it can't be wrong!"

"Don't say that I do not have grounds to
be that self-confident!
Please help to procure this meat!"

"老成した動物のお肉って、基本的には
硬くなる事が多いはずなのよね。
鍛え抜かれてるようなものだから。"

"でも、龍族のお肉はそうとは限らない！
……はず。たぶん。きっと。
ううん、間違いない！"

"根拠のない自信とか言わないで！
お肉の調達、お願いね！"
